options_page_section_others_assignment_f.message:
When a file is uploaded on the assignment submission page, the file name is changed to the specified format. This can be set individually on the course's settings page. Each of the following strings in the file name format will be replaced as follows. 
- `{course}`: course name
- `{assignment}`: assignment name
- `{filename}`: file name without extension
- `{extension}`: extension including period
